languages.text: {n}Мужчина с горделивым лицом отвечает вам исполненным достоинства поклоном. На лице написаны спокойствие и безукоризненная твердость.{/n} "И я приветствую вас, почтенн{mf|ый|ая} {name} фон Валанциус. Пусть тень не омрачит свет {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Астрономикона{/g}, ведущий вас".

traits.locale_text: {n}Мужчина с горделивым лицом отвечает вам исполненным достоинства поклоном. На лице написаны спокойствие и безукоризненная твердость.{/n} "И я приветствую вас, почтенн{mf|ый|ая} {name} фон Валанциус. Пусть тень не омрачит свет Астрономикона, ведущий вас".

languages.text: {n}He responds with a dignified bow, his proud face calm and unfaltering.{/n} "And my greetings to you, esteemed {name} von Valancius. May shadows never darken the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} that guides you."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина с горделивым лицом отвечает вам исполненным достоинства поклоном. На лице написаны спокойствие и безукоризненная твердость.{/n} "И я приветствую вас, почтенн{mf|ый|ая} {name} фон Валанциус. Пусть тень не омрачит свет {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Астрономикона{/g}, ведущий вас".

traits.locale_text: {n}He responds with a dignified bow, his proud face calm and unfaltering.{/n} "And my greetings to you, esteemed {name} von Valancius. May shadows never darken the light of the Astronomican which guides you."

{n}He responds with a dignified bow, his proud face calm and unfaltering.{/n} "And my greetings to you, esteemed {name} von Valancius. May shadows never darken the light of the Astronomican which guides you."

{n}He responds with a dignified bow, his proud face calm and unfaltering.{/n} "And my greetings to you, esteemed {name} von Valancius. May shadows never darken the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} that guides you."

{n}He responds with a dignified bow, his proud face calm and unfaltering.{/n} "And my greetings to you, esteemed {name} von Valancius. May shadows never darken the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} that guides you."

{n}He responds with a dignified bow, his proud face calm and unfaltering.{/n} "And my greetings to you, esteemed {name} von Valancius. May shadows never darken the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} that guides you."

languages.text: {n}異端審問官は誇りに満ちた表情を固く崩さないまま、慇懃な礼をする。{/n}「私からもご挨拶申し上げます、尊敬受けし{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。陛下を導く{g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}星辰波{/g}の光が、決して影に覆われることのないように」
languages.original_text: {n}He responds with a dignified bow, his proud face calm and unfaltering.{/n} "And my greetings to you, esteemed {name} von Valancius. May shadows never darken the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} that guides you."

traits.locale_text: {n}異端審問官は誇りに満ちた表情を固く崩さないまま、慇懃な礼をする。{/n}「私からもご挨拶申し上げます、尊敬受けし{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。陛下を導く{g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}星辰波{/g}の光が、決して影に覆われることのないように」

languages.text: {n}他庄重地鞠躬回应，高傲的脸上露出了平静而坚定的表情。{/n}“向你致意，尊敬的{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。愿阴影永远不会遮蔽指引你的{g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}星炬{/g}之光。”
languages.original_text: {n}He responds with a dignified bow, his proud face calm and unfaltering.{/n} "And my greetings to you, esteemed {name} von Valancius. May shadows never darken the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} that guides you."

traits.locale_text: {n}他庄重地鞠躬回应，高傲的脸上露出了平静而坚定的表情。{/n}“向你致意，尊敬的{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。愿阴影永远不会遮蔽指引你的{g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}星炬{/g}之光。”

languages.text: {n}Te responde con una digna reverencia, sin dejar que su rostro muestre cambio alguno.{/n} «Y saludos a usted, estimad{mf|o|a} {name} von Valancius. Que las sombras nunca oscurezcan la luz del {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomicón{/g} que le guía».
languages.original_text: {n}He responds with a dignified bow, his proud face calm and unfaltering.{/n} "And my greetings to you, esteemed {name} von Valancius. May shadows never darken the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} that guides you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Te responde con una digna reverencia, sin dejar que su rostro muestre cambio alguno.{/n} «Y saludos a usted, estimad{mf|o|a} {name} von Valancius. Que las sombras nunca oscurezcan la luz del {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomicón{/g} que le guía».

languages.text: {n}Il vous répond d'un air impassible en s'inclinant avec dignité :{/n} « Salutations à vous également, honorable {name} von Valancius. Que la lumière de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} qui vous guide jamais ne faiblisse. »
languages.original_text: {n}He responds with a dignified bow, his proud face calm and unfaltering.{/n} "And my greetings to you, esteemed {name} von Valancius. May shadows never darken the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} that guides you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il vous répond d'un air impassible en s'inclinant avec dignité :{/n} « Salutations à vous également, honorable {name} von Valancius. Que la lumière de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} qui vous guide jamais ne faiblisse. »

languages.text: {n}Er antwortet mit einer würdevollen Verbeugung, seine stolze Miene bleibt ungerührt.{/n} "Und auch Euch meine Grüße, {mf|geschätzter|geschätzte} {name} von Valancius. Mögen niemals Schatten das Licht des {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} verdunkeln, das Euch leitet."
languages.original_text: {n}He responds with a dignified bow, his proud face calm and unfaltering.{/n} "And my greetings to you, esteemed {name} von Valancius. May shadows never darken the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} that guides you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er antwortet mit einer würdevollen Verbeugung, seine stolze Miene bleibt ungerührt.{/n} "Und auch Euch meine Grüße, {mf|geschätzter|geschätzte} {name} von Valancius. Mögen niemals Schatten das Licht des {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} verdunkeln, das Euch leitet."

languages.text: {n}Engizisyoncu, ağırbaşlı bir şekilde eğilip selam vererek karşılıkta bulunuyor. Mağrur yüzü, sükunetini ve kararlılığını koruyor.{/n} "Sana da selam olsun saygın {name} von Valancius. Sana yol gösteren {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomikan{/g}, asla hakikatin ışığından şaşmasın."
languages.original_text: {n}He responds with a dignified bow, his proud face calm and unfaltering.{/n} "And my greetings to you, esteemed {name} von Valancius. May shadows never darken the light of the {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomican{/g} that guides you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Enginizisyoncu, yanıt olarak ağırbaşlı bir şekilde eğilerek selamlıyor. Mağrur yüzü, sükunetini ve kararlılığını koruyor.{/n} "Size de selamlar olsun saygın {name} von Valancius. Dilerim size yol gösteren {g|Encyclopedia:Astronomican}Astronomikan{/g}, asla hakikatin ışığından şaşmaz."
